GapFillInput.Instruction: Put the verb in brackets ( ) into the correct form of used to. Type your answers in each gap.

Content.Question:
1. She used to do (She / do) yoga but she's stopped now.
2. I used to be (I / be) very impatient but I'm better now.
3. It didn't use to cost (It / not / cost) so much to go to the cinema.
4. My sister used to call (My sister / call) me â€˜Buzz'.
5. How often did you use to go (you / go) skiing?
6. We used to meet (We / meet) every Friday afternoon.
7. Bill didn't use to like (Bill / not / like) school.
8. Where did they use to stay (they / stay) when they went to France?
